title: Global Finance Names Citi Best Sub-Custodian Bank in Latin America for 10th Year in a Row
summary: Miami, Florida - Global Finance Magazine has awarded Citi as Best Sub-Custodian Bank in Latin America for the 10th year in a row. In addition, the bank obtained the recognition in Argentina, Colombia, Peru and Venezuela. Globally, Citi also obtained the award in the U.S., consolidating its leadership on the market for sub-custodian services across the Americas.
tag-1: Global Finance Names Citi Best Sub-Custodian Bank in Latin America for 10th Year in a Row
tag-3: Miami, Florida – Global Finance Magazine has awarded Citi as Best Sub-Custodian Bank in Latin America for the 10th year in a row. In addition, the bank obtained the recognition in Argentina, Colombia, Peru and Venezuela. Globally, Citi also obtained the award in the U.S., consolidating its leadership on the market for sub-custodian services across the Americas.
tag-4: The Global Finance sub-custodian awards recognize market excellence in the effective handling of security portfolios in regional and local markets, providing services to global custodians. Finance editors and reporters, with input from expert sources, selected the winners from the institutions that reliably provide the best custody services. The factors considered included quality of service, customer relations, competitive pricing, smooth handling of exception items, technology platforms, post-settlement operations, business continuity plans and knowledge of local regulations and practices.
tag-5: Commenting on the award, Alejandro Berney, Latin America Region Head, Citi Securities & Fund Services, said, "We are very honored to receive these awards that recognize Citi's hard work and dedication to our clients year over year. It is our priority to continue delivering the highest standards of quality and efficiency and provide the best custody services."
tag-6: Citi has been a leading provider of custody services in the region for more than two decades, with approximately US $700 billion in assets under custody in Latin America. Through offices in 21 countries, Citi provides a full suite of administration and custody services to Hedge Funds, Private Equity, Securitization and Real Estate funds across the region.
tag-7: Citi's Securities and Fund Services provides customized solutions that support the diverse investment and transaction strategies of investors, issuers and intermediaries worldwide. Offering a suite of investment administration, portfolio and fund services, trust and custody and investment and financing solutions, Citi helps clients meet the challenges of issuing, managing and distributing financial products and services in today's complex and competitive marketplace. As of March 31, 2013, Securities and Fund Services held $13.5 trillion in assets under custody and administration.
tag-8: Citi Citi, the leading global bank, has approximately 200 million customer accounts and does business in more than 160 countries and jurisdictions. Citi provides consumers, corporations, governments and institutions with a broad range of financial products and services, including consumer banking and credit, corporate and investment banking, securities brokerage, transaction services, and wealth management.
